# Lenses

## Aperture Rings

In modes **A** (aperture-priority AE) and **M** (manual), you can choose the aperture (f-number) by rotating the lens aperture ring.

!Aperture Ring Diagram

| Setting | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **C**   | With the aperture ring in the C or A position, you can choose the aperture (f-number) by rotating the camera command dial. |
| **A**   | Set aperture to the selected value. |

> To select **C** or **A**, or to select another value after selecting **C** or **A**, press the aperture ring lock release while rotating the aperture ring.

## T/S Lenses

View the shift amount or rotate amount of lenses on the EVF or LCD. The shift and rotate amounts are displayed in increments of 0.5 mm and 3Â°, respectively.

!T/S Lenses Display

> The shift amount and rotate amount are also recorded to the EXIF data of images that have been taken.
